title: North Korea launches four more missiles as U.S. flies bombers over South
description: North Korea launched four ballistic missiles into the sea, as the U.S sent two bombers over South Korea in a dueling display of military might that underscored rising tensions in the region.
content:encoded:
North Korea launched four ballistic missiles into the sea, as the U.S sent two bombers over South Korea in a dueling display of military might that underscored rising tensions in the region.

(Image credit: South Korea Defense Ministry via AP)
dc:creator: The Associated Press
